com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics

Enum OcclusionBuffer.Policy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<OcclusionBuffer.Policy>
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.OcclusionBuffer.Policy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<OcclusionBuffer.Policy>
    Enclosing class:
    OcclusionBuffer

    private static enum OcclusionBuffer.Policy
extends java.lang.Enum<OcclusionBuffer.Policy>
    Determines actions and return values for triangle rasterization policies.

      • evaluate

        boolean evaluate(OcclusionBuffer.Quaternion[] vertices)
        Evaluate the positions of the vertices depending on policy.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertices in camera space.
        Returns:
        True if in query mode and any of the vertices are behind camera frustum near plane.

      • process

        boolean process(java.nio.FloatBuffer depthBuffer,
                int bufferIndex,
                float newDepth)
        Compare the current value in the depth buffer with a new value. If draw policy is used, write the new value if it is larger than current depth (closer to camera). If query is used, return true if new depth not occluded by old depth.
        Parameters:
        depthBuffer - The depth buffer.
        bufferIndex - Index in buffer at which to compare depth.
        newDepth - New value to compare with.
        Returns:
        True if in query mode and new value closer to the camera, false otherwise.
